main.name: Suman Das
main.bio: I am a backend developer, a knack for error solving, learning new technologies and a passion for coding. I pursued my first development job to kick off my career. I was hired as a Ruby on Rails developer by Yotto Labs it was my job, currently I am working at Spaceo-O technologies as a Ruby on Rails developer where I still work today.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: Brainware Group of Institutions - Sabita Devi Education Trust, is an academic institution imparting quality education in Management and Engineering courses.
Kalna Polytechnic - is a government polytechnic located in Kalna, Purba Bardhaman district, West Bengal. Affiliated to the West Bengal State Council of Technical Education.

work.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
work.description: Space-O is a top mobile app development company in USA, Canada & India, offering iPhone (iOS) & Android app development services.

work.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
work.description: Arrivae is a furniture company, they have some product to maintain their business. As a junior developer I have worked on their project mainly at the backend and sometimes also worked on frontend using React. They were used Bitbucket, Jira, Rails 5.2.1, etc.

work.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
work.description:
Yottolabs is a product based company. As a trainee ROR developer I hade learned some important things from Yottolabs that is how to work as a team member.

I have learned basic syntaxes of ROR, database query, understanding the logic behind tasks. I have worked on their main project which was “insite” and that purpose I have learned the use of some tools like GitLab, Redmine and Paytm Payment Gateway integration

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control.

skills.name: Rails
skills.description: Rails is my full stack framework of choice. I have near about one and half year of experience on Rails.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really like it at first. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website.

testimonials.text: I have worked with suman on some projects in yottolabs, he is very committed towards his daily task and always search for the solution in every possible way , he is very punctual and always try to help and encourage others.
testimonials.user: Saheb Seikh - Web Developer at kumulus

testimonials.text: Suman is a very talented and enthusiastic person. I have seen him come office and work indefinitely until his project was complete. He is always energetic and his skills are very good.
testimonials.user: Koustav Gorain - Web Developer at Netzary Infodynamics
